interface.name: apt_domtrans
interface.summary: Execute apt programs in the apt domain.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: apt_run
interface.summary: Execute apt programs in the apt domain.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

param.name: role
param.summary: The role to allow the apt domain.

param.name: terminal
param.summary: The type of the terminal allow the apt domain to use.

interface.name: apt_use_fds
interface.summary: Inherit and use file descriptors from apt.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: apt_read_pipes
interface.summary: Read from an unnamed apt pipe.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: apt_rw_pipes
interface.summary: Read and write an unnamed apt pipe.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: apt_manage_db
interface.summary: Create, read, write, and delete the apt package database.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: apt_dontaudit_manage_db
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to create, read, write, and delete the apt package database.
